channel.title: CVE Feed for Grand Vice info Co. -- webopac7

item.title: CVE-2021-42839|2024-08-04T03:38:50.073Z -- grand%20vice%20info%20co. -- webopac7
item.description: Grand Vice info Co. webopac7 file upload function fails to filter special characters. While logging in with general userâ€™s permission, remote attackers can upload malicious script and execute arbitrary code to control the system or interrupt services.

item.title: CVE-2021-42838|2024-08-04T03:38:50.273Z -- grand%20vice%20info%20co. -- webopac7
item.description: Grand Vice info Co. webopac7 book search field parameter does not properly restrict the input of special characters, thus unauthenticated attackers can inject JavaScript syntax remotely, and further perform reflective XSS attacks.
